verses.name: Romans 15:6
verses.text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Romans 15:7
verses.text: Wherefore receive ye one another, as Christ also received us to the glory of God.

verses.name: Romans 15:8
verses.text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, to confirm the promises made unto the fathers:

verses.name: Romans 15:9
verses.text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy; as it is written, For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles, and sing unto thy name.

verses.name: Romans 15:10
verses.text: And again he saith, Rejoice, ye Gentiles, with his people.
